DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate prevalence abdominal aortic aneurysm ( AAA ) among male patient coronary artery disease ( CAD ) verify coronary angiography . Ethiology AAA known common atherosclerotic arterial disease ( coronary artery disease , peripheral artery disease carotid artery disease ) , hypothesis AAA common among CAD patient , thus make screen patient ( AAA ) cost-efficient . Study carry multi-center prospective screening study . Data collect North Karelia Central Hospital , Kuopio University Hospital Tampere University Hospital . Data consist 200 consecutive coronary angiography patient hospital , result 600 patient total . All male patient diagnose CAD recruit study screen AAA ultrasound . Nevertheless , patient previously know AAA exclude study .
DOC.brief_title: Prevalence Screening Abdominal Aortic Aneurysms Among Men With Coronary Artery Disease
DOC.criteria: Male patient coronary artery disease Patient 's denial participate Female Gender Already diagnose treat abdominal aortic aneurysm
